name: ProjectiveSpace
docs:
A projective space
A projective space P(V) is the set of lines through the origin in a vector space V.
Equivalently, it is the quotient of V\{0} by the scaling action of the multiplicative group.

members.name: dimension
members.docs: Dimension (one less than vector space dimension)

members.name: scalar_field
members.docs: Field over which space is defined

members.name: HasCoordinates
members.docs: Whether the space has a preferred coordinate system

name: ScalarFieldType
docs: Types of scalar fields for projective spaces
